a house, especially a large or official one
legal permission to live in a country for a certain period of time
Jeff has permanent residence in Canada, but is still a US citizen.
the state of living in a place
Rome was his main place of residence.
the fact of living in a particular place
Insurance companies use place of residence to calculate automobile insurance rates.
permission to live in a particular country permanently
Florida law protects personal residences against seizure in bankruptcy law.
